sentence.Network_en: My friend came by and gave me this beautiful epiphyllum.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的朋友到来,送我这个美丽的昙花.

sentence.Network_en: Epiphyllum all efforts is not the moment to the beautiful bloom.
sentence.Network_cn: 昙花所有的努力还不是为了那一刻美丽的绽放.

sentence.Network_en: Life can be a steep mountain, a turbulent rapids, Epiphyllum an instant.
sentence.Network_cn: 人生可以是一座陡峭的高山, 一条动荡的急流, 一朵瞬间的昙花.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from epi- 'upon' + Greek phullon 'leaf'

means.word_mean: 1. any cactus of the genus Epiphyllum having flattened jointed irregularly branching stems and showy tubular flowers
